NULL (default) value Sys.getenv("REDCap_API_URI") used. token API token project want export . NULL (default) value Sys.getenv("REDCap_API_TOKEN") used. format format return. NULL (default) value Sys.getenv("REDCap_API_format") used.

title: Build R Data Package — build_r_data_package
text: export data REDCap project need API Token. Remember, token equivalent username password.  list token plan text.  Several alternative methods passing token method provided examples vignettes. strongly encourage use package secret https://cran.r-project.org/package=secret build vaults store tokens locally. initial export consist four pieces data, user data, metadata, project info, records.

title: Column Types — col_type
text: REDCap text fields dates times formatted via lubridate text files coerced Variables inputted REDCap via radio button dropdown lists (multiple choice - pick one) coerced factors default can returned characters argument factors = FALSE set. Calculated slider (visual analog scale) variables coerced via .numeric. Yes/True/False variables include integer values 0 = False, 1 Yes True. Checkboxes difficult work metadata records.  checkbox field_name metadata , example, "eg_checkbox" columns records "eg_checkbox___<code>" "code" numbers, character strings.  REDCapExporter attempts coerce "eg_checkbox___<code>" columns integer values, 0 = unchecked 1 = checked.

title: Export Content — export_content

title: Export Content — export_content
code: export_content(content, uri = NULL, token = NULL, format = NULL, ...)

title: Export Content — export_content
text: content element export, see Details. uri URI REDCap API.  NULL (default) value Sys.getenv("REDCap_API_URI") used. token API token project want export . NULL (default) value Sys.getenv("REDCap_API_TOKEN") used. format format return. NULL (default) value Sys.getenv("REDCap_API_format") used. ... additional arguments passed handle_setform.

title: Export Content — export_content
text: raw return REDCap API class rcer_raw_<content>.

title: Export Content — export_content
text: content format arguments used control specific items exported, format.  **Review API documentation** uri, token, format arguments set NULL default look Sys.getenv("REDCap_API_URI"), Sys.getenv("REDCap_API_TOKEN"), Sys.getenv("REDCap_API_format"), respectively, define values explicitly done end user.
